sqlMap.statement:
SELECT C.CPO_ORD_NUM ,C.SELL_TO_CUST_CD ,PD.LINE_BIZ_TP_CD ,STC.DS_ACCT_NM
,C.CPO_SRC_TP_CD
,C.DS_ORD_CATG_CD ,C.DS_ORD_TP_CD
FROM CPO C ,DS_ORD_TP_PROC_DFN PD ,SELL_TO_CUST STC WHERE C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND C.CPO_SRC_TP_CD IN
#cpoSrcTpCdList[]#
AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C.ORD_BOOK_FLG = #flgY# AND C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND C.DS_ORD_TP_CD = PD.DS_ORD_TP_CD AND PD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND C.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = STC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM HIST_IS_WEB_SEND_CONF H WHERE H.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND H.CPO_ORD_NUM = C.CPO_ORD_NUM AND H.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM DS_CPO_CTAC_PSN P WHERE P.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND P.CPO_ORD_NUM = C.CPO_ORD_NUM AND P.CTAC_PSN_EML_ADDR IS NOT NULL AND P.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ORD_CATG_BIZ_CTX OCBC WHERE OCBC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND OCBC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND OCBC.ORD_CATG_CTX_TP_CD = #ordCatgCtxTpCd# AND ( ( OCBC.DS_ORD_CATG_CD IS NULL AND OCBC.DS_ORD_TP_CD IS NULL AND OCBC.DS_ORD_RSN_CD IS NULL) OR ( OCBC.DS_ORD_CATG_CD = C.DS_ORD_CATG_CD AND OCBC.DS_ORD_TP_CD IS NULL AND OCBC.DS_ORD_RSN_CD IS NULL) OR ( OCBC.DS_ORD_CATG_CD = C.DS_ORD_CATG_CD AND OCBC.DS_ORD_TP_CD = C.DS_ORD_TP_CD AND OCBC.DS_ORD_RSN_CD IS NULL) OR ( OCBC.DS_ORD_CATG_CD = C.DS_ORD_CATG_CD AND OCBC.DS_ORD_TP_CD = C.DS_ORD_TP_CD AND OCBC.DS_ORD_RSN_CD = C.DS_ORD_RSN_CD) ) )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CPO_DTL CD WHERE CD.CPO_ORD_NUM = C.CPO_ORD_NUM AND CD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = 'ADB' AND CD.ORD_LINE_STS_CD != '99' )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.CPO_ORD_NUM ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C.CPO_ORD_TS, #s21DtFmt#), #mlOutDtFmt#, #mlOutDtNlsParam#) CPO_ORD_DT ,C.SELL_TO_FIRST_REF_CMNT_TXT ,SMM.SER_NUM ,MN.T_MDL_NM MDL_NM ,NVL(M1.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT, M2.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT) MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT ,CD.ORD_QTY
,DCCP.CTAC_PSN_FIRST_NM || ' ' || DCCP.CTAC_PSN_LAST_NM CTAC_PSN_NM
,STC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR || DECODE(STC.SCD_LINE_ADDR, null, '', ' ' || STC.SCD_LINE_ADDR) || DECODE(STC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR, null, '', ' ' || STC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR) || DECODE(STC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR, null, '', ' ' || STC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR) || DECODE(STC.CTY_ADDR, null, '', ', ' || STC.CTY_ADDR) || DECODE(STC.ST_CD, null, '', ', ' || STC.ST_CD) || DECODE(STC.POST_CD, null, '', ', ' || STC.POST_CD) SHIP_TO_INFO ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER( PARTITION BY C.CPO_ORD_NUM, CD.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK, CD.MDSE_CD
ORDER BY DCCP.DS_CPO_CTAC_PSN_PK DESC
) ROW_NUM ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER( PARTITION BY C.CPO_ORD_NUM ORDER BY CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_NUM, CD.CPO_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM ) SORT_NUM FROM CPO C ,CPO_DTL CD ,SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,SVC_CONFIG_MSTR SCM ,MDL_NM MN ,MDSE M1 ,ORD_TAKE_MDSE OTM ,MDSE M2 ,SHIP_TO_CUST STC
,DS_CPO_CTAC_PSN DCCP
WHERE C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND C.CPO_ORD_NUM = #cpoOrdNum# AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND C.CPO_ORD_NUM = CD.CPO_ORD_NUM AND CD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CD.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SMM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = SCM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK
AND SCM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MN.T_GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SCM.MDL_ID = MN.T_MDL_ID AND MN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = M1.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND CD.MDSE_CD = M1.MDSE_CD (+) AND M1.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0' AND CD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OTM.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND CD.MDSE_CD = OTM.ORD_TAKE_MDSE_CD (+) AND OTM.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0' AND OTM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = M2.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND OTM.MDSE_CD = M2.MDSE_CD (+) AND M2.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0' AND C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND C.ADD_SHIP_TO_CUST_CD = STC.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DCCP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND C.CPO_ORD_NUM = DCCP.CPO_ORD_NUM AND DCCP.CTAC_PSN_TP_CD = #ctacTpCd# AND DCCP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
) WHERE ROW_NUM = 1 ORDER BY SORT_NUM

SELECT RW.ORD_CONF_RPT_WRK_PK FROM ORD_CONF_RPT_WRK RW WHERE RW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RW.BIZ_APP_ID = #bizAppId# AND RW.OTPT_OP_CD = #otptOpCd#
AND EXISTS (
SELECT 1 FROM EIP_RPT_INP_PRM IP ,EIP_RPT_RQST RR WHERE RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND IP.RPT_PRM_NM = #trxHdrNum# AND IP.RPT_PRM_VAL_TXT = RW.TRX_HDR_NUM AND IP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND IP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND IP.EIP_RPT_RQST_PK = RR.EIP_RPT_RQST_PK
AND RR.RPT_RQST_STS_TXT = #prtRqstSts#
AND RR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM EIP_RPT_INP_PRM IPA WHERE IPA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND IPA.EIP_RPT_RQST_PK = IP.EIP_RPT_RQST_PK AND IPA.RPT_PRM_NM = #columnBizAppId# AND IPA.RPT_PRM_VAL_TXT = #bizAppId# AND IPA.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' )
)
